verbose_text: EA stimulation of acupoint Zusanli was able to reduce the excitability of the DRG neurons and the expression of related neurotransmitters and receptors, thus remarkably relieving the symptoms of visceral hyperalgesia [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: EA stimulation of acupoint Zusanli was able to reduce the excitability of the DRG
